TIP4Addr Record

Summary

Represents type TIP4Addr.

Namespace: flcSocketLib
Syntax
Delphi
type
 TIP4Addr = packed record
 case Integer of
 0 : (Addr8 : array[0..3] of Byte);
 1 : (Addr16 : array[0..1] of Word);
 2 : (Addr32 : Word32);
 end;
